meanings.definition: Achieving a high score or grade in a test or exam.
meanings.sent1: She was acing her math test with ease.
meanings.sent2: He is known for acing all his exams effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The student kept acing every test, making it look like a piece of cake.
meanings.sent4: Her consistent acing of exams turned her into the class superstar.
meanings.sent5: The feeling of acing a test is like winning a small victory.

meanings.definition: Performing exceptionally well in a task or activity.
meanings.sent1: The team was acing their project presentation.
meanings.sent2: She was acing the dance performance with grace.
meanings.sent3: The cat was acing its hunting skills, catching every mouse in sight.
meanings.sent4: His acing of the negotiation made him the go-to person for deals.
meanings.sent5: The acing of the difficult task left everyone in awe.
